app.title: Mojo: Reels and Video Captions
app.description:
Creating trending social content has never been simpler. Mojo is an app designed to help you make amazing video content for Instagram and TikTok and more. Mojo is made in Paris and has already been downloaded by over 40 million people worldwide.

To use Mojo, simply download the app and start exploring one of our 700+ unique templates. After selecting the template youâ€™d like to edit, choose from a number of our editing features to create the perfect video. You can then easily resize and share your content to any social platform with the touch of a button.

While editing, you can choose from a number of our top features like adding auto-captions, text effects, filters, and creating a grid. You can also select one of our trending templates which is already paired perfectly with a trending sound from Instagram and TikTok!

Mojo is an inclusive app made for everyone. Whether youâ€™re a creator, small business owner, photographer, or a first-time social user - there will be something for you! 

Take a look at our top features and why our users love them:

Trending sounds templates

- Choose from our unique trending sounds templates that connect directly to trending sounds on Instagram and TikTok
- Get inspired in our trending sounds collection and create videos with already identified trends

Auto captions

- Add auto-captions to maximize your views
- Select from a variety of auto-caption styles to stand out on social
- Translate your captions into a different language than the one youâ€™re speaking

Text effects

- Easily add aesthetic text effects to your videos
- Select from a variety of styles like modern, retro, speech bubbles, and calls to action

All-in-one video editor

- Edit all of your videos on one platform
- Trim your clips, add transitions, music, text, and animated elements on Mojo

Background removal

- Remove the background from any image in one tap
- The perfect tool for business owners to showcase their products

Brand kit

- Save your brand fonts, colors, and logos to the brand kit tool
- Easily stay on brand while creating your content on Mojo

AI tools

- Select any photo from your camera roll and watch Mojo turn it into a meme

Royalty free music

- Choose from our royalty-free tracks that can be used for commercial purposes
- Upload your own music and add it to any of our templates

Transitions

- Seamlessly add transitions to your videos to elevate visual appeal
- Elevate professionalism with a variety of available transitions like zoom in, fisheye, ripped paper, camera slides in different directions, and so many more
- Apply your transitions to your whole video in just one tap

Share across all social platforms

- Share to Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and other social platforms in just one tap
- Mojo easily resizes your content depending on the platform youâ€™re sharing to

Edit the animations of all elements

- Animate any element of your video and capture your viewers attention

Animated stickers and graphics

- Incorporate animated stickers and graphics into your videos
- Add GIFs directly in the app

Terms of Use: https://www.mojo-app.com/terms-of-use

We're always open to feedback, email us yours at feedback@mojo.video.

From Paris with love,

The Mojo Team

app.summary: All-in-one social content maker: Auto subtitles, video editor, story & collages

reviews.text: Previously I gave this app 5 stars, but after their updated version came, it deserves only 2. All my video drafts were blank when I opened the app and there were nearly 10-15 drafts. Moreover, the new version has timing issues. All the text and effects move way faster so it gives an impression that the video was rushed (only 5 seconds). New is not always better.

Options missing for Android users? I was suggested to this app by a friend who created amazing videos on her iPhone. Though I have most features on my Samsung Note, I find she has the ability to do a lot more. Also, the recent update does not allow me to select all text options showing, even after multiple tries. Please reconsider your pricing or open up more options, thank you!

Edited back up to 4 stars after last update. One of the best story apps on the market right now. Easy to use interface and some really amazing templates for stories, even in the free version. Android version finally caught up to the apple version. Developers seemed to have listened and fixed expressed issues, so that's even more awesome. I still would prefer to pay a one time fee for the pro version, as I have for other apps (why I docked 1 star), but for what it offers Mojo is top tier!

I loved the app but the music of my projects all of a sudden stopped downloading on my devices. I have been back and forth with customer service for over a month but still no solution to the problem. Updated the app to a new version didnt work. Restarting my phone didnt work. I am hoping they fix it by the end of this week, if not, as good as the app is, it's not worth the the headaches and non-action of their customer support.
reviews.replyText: Hi, we would like to fix this. As we don't have your email address, can you please write to us at feedback@mojo.video so that we can help you better. We look forward to your email.

reviews.text: I actually loved this app on first try so much i bought the pro version for a year. Imagine my shock to see almost every PRO feature is unavailable to android users..Two templates for Business, food, etc makes no sense at all and it keeps freezing. You say you offer a refund yet the email i sent requesting a refund and cancellation of the annual plan subscription has gone unanswered. I want my money back. When your app improves I'm happy to pay for it and change my rating.
reviews.replyText: Hey Jennifer ðŸ‘‹Sorry about this! Could you please send us a message directly through the app? We will order a refund.

reviews.text: App is great, but I paid for the pro version and pro features worked during the 3-day trial and got locked after that. I check my bank transactions and I was charged for the upgrade. We I open the app it says I have the pro subscription. I contacted their customer service and it said it would take them one day to reply. That was 2 days ago and haven't heard back from them
reviews.replyText:
Hey Dario,
When you try the pro version, it is mentionned that you have only a free trial of 3 days. After it is automatically withdraw. If you want a refund, please send us a message through the app :) Thanks

reviews.text: App hasn't worked right - I even signed up for subscription hoping it'd fix the issue. I have the latest version app on both my Android phone and my iPad. On the android, the gold text comes up black, and the video stops playing after a few seconds. On the iPad, while the gold text is ok and the video plays ok, the video is added up-side down. I feel I can't win with this one....was really hoping to like this app as I really love the gold text feature - goes really well with my brand. When I click to contact support, nothing happens.
reviews.replyText:
Hey Fernanda,
Please it would be very helpful if you can send us the same email at feedback@mojo.video so we can help you further on those problems and give as much solutions as we can !
We look forward to your email.
Thanks

reviews.text: Used to be good then stopped working. Music not paying throughout and unable to export whole video. Apparently its not optimised for Android. So if you have an android phone, don't waste your money on a pro subscription until they've fixed the issues. *Edit post comment from Mojo - Already been speaking to their team for months via the email provided below. The app still isn't optimised for android so don't really see what fix they can provide.
reviews.replyText: Hi, we would like to fix this. As we don't have your email address, can you please write to us at feedback@mojo.video so that we can help you better. We look forward to your email.

reviews.text: This app is one of the weakest for stories I've tried so far, and I've almost tried them all. Absolutely not worth the money in my opionen. Mainly for the reason that you can't add pictures in bulk and the app will automatically stich it together (many other can). Also when you export a story you need to add a picture for EVERY frame, otherwise it exports blank frames and you can forget the whole story. Not fixing this is just lazy by the developer, or simply not caring enough for quality.

Don't even bother. It has so many bugs you can't do anything. The preview is buggy, sliders are so sensitive that you can't really adjust anything, exporting videos get you a blank video, editing textboxes is absolutely annoying. You can't simply export to your device. Phew... and they want to charge you for every little extra feature. Mojo: please hire some QA personnel.
reviews.replyText: Hi MauricioðŸ‘‹ Sorry that you don't like our Android app ðŸ˜”. It's getting better and better so feel free to keep the app up-to-date. We try to improve the app everyday. We will transmit everything to our technicians. Thanks !

app.developerLegalAddress: 55 E 59TH St FL 9, New York, NY 10022-1762, United States
app.AIReview:
Mojo: Reels and Video Captions â€“ A Comprehensive Review

Overview

Mojo, boasting over 40 million downloads and a robust rating of 4.58 out of 5, positions itself as an all-in-one social content creation powerhouse, specifically tailored for platforms like Instagram and TikTok. Developed in Paris, the appâ€™s core functionality revolves around simplifying the process of generating trending videos with pre-designed templates, automated subtitles, and a surprisingly comprehensive video editing suite â€“ all offered at no cost. With 17,117,195 total installs, Mojo clearly taps into the massive demand for easy-to-use tools within the dynamic landscape of short-form social media content creation. The appâ€™s strength lies in its accessibility; it aims to democratize video production by removing technical barriers and providing creators with a streamlined workflow.

Key Features

Mojo's feature set is ambitious, aiming to cover nearly every aspect of creating engaging video content:

  • Template Library: The app offers over 700 unique templates categorized by themes (e.g., travel, food, fashion, motivational) and trending styles. This provides a significant head start for users who aren't confident in their editing skills.
  • Auto Subtitle Generation: A standout feature is the automatic subtitle generation using speech-to-text technology. This dramatically reduces the time spent manually adding captions â€“ a crucial element for accessibility and engagement on platforms like TikTok where audio is often prioritized. The accuracy of this feature appears to be quite high during testing, although results may vary depending on audio quality.
  • Video Editor: Beyond template application, Mojo includes a basic but functional video editor offering trimming, merging clips, adding music (from a built-in library or user uploads), adjusting speed, and applying filters.
  • Story & Collage Creation: The app facilitates the creation of both Instagram Stories and photo collages, providing further versatility for content distribution across different social channels.
  • Resize & Share: Seamless integration with sharing directly to Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and other popular platforms is a core element of the user experience.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: Mojo's intuitive interface is undoubtedly its greatest strength. The template-based system makes video creation accessible even for complete beginners. The drag-and-drop functionality and clear visual cues minimize the learning curve.
  • Large Template Library: 700+ templates represent a massive resource, ensuring users can find options that align with their content ideas. Regularly updated templates are key to maintaining relevance within rapidly evolving trends.
  • Automatic Subtitles: The auto-subtitle feature is a game-changer, particularly for creators who frequently produce videos without scripts or rely heavily on spoken word content. This significantly improves accessibility and reach.
  • High Download Numbers: The appâ€™s immense download volume (17 million+ installs) speaks to its popularity and perceived value within the social media community. This suggests a strong marketing strategy and/or genuinely useful functionality.

Areas for Improvement

  • Editing Tool Limitations: While adequate for basic edits, the video editor lacks advanced features commonly found in professional editing apps. More granular control over color grading, transitions, and audio mixing would significantly enhance its capabilities.
  • Template Over-Reliance: The template system, while beneficial initially, can lead to content feeling homogenous if users rely on them exclusively. Encouraging experimentation beyond the templates through more advanced editing tools could foster greater creative expression.
  • Music Library Quality: The built-in music library, although convenient, predominantly consists of royalty-free tracks. Offering higher quality licensed music options (potentially as a premium feature) would be a valuable addition.
  • Performance on Low-End Devices: With 17 million installs across a wide range of devices, itâ€™s possible some users experience performance issues on older or less powerful smartphones. Optimization for lower-end hardware is crucial.

User Experience

The user experience within Mojo is generally positive and fluid. Navigating the app feels natural, thanks to its clean design and logical layout. The template selection process is straightforward, allowing users to quickly browse and preview options. Importing clips and applying edits is intuitive, and the auto-subtitle feature operates smoothly. However, during testing, there were occasional minor lag moments when processing complex edits or exporting larger videos â€“ a potential area for optimization. The app's responsiveness on different screen sizes was consistent and well-executed.

Value for Money

Mojoâ€™s offering of a fully functional, comprehensive social content creation suite completely free represents exceptional value for money. There are no in-app purchases or subscriptions required to access the core features. While premium features could be introduced later (e.g., access to higher quality music tracks, advanced editing tools), the current free version provides an incredibly compelling offering to anyone looking to create engaging social media content.

Conclusion

Mojo is a remarkably successful app that effectively addresses the growing demand for easy-to-use video creation tools. Its template library, combined with the innovative auto-subtitle feature and straightforward editing capabilities, makes it a powerful resource for both novice and intermediate creators. While there are areas for improvement, particularly concerning advanced editing features and potential performance optimization, Mojo's strengths significantly outweigh its weaknesses. With over 17 million users already engaged, itâ€™s clear that Mojo has struck a chord with the social media community â€“ a testament to its intuitive design and valuable functionality. It earns a strong recommendation for anyone looking to effortlessly produce trending videos for Instagram, TikTok, or other platforms.
